title: How to Draw Sonic Characters

steps.headline: Sketch a big circle and a smaller circle attached to each other.
steps.description: These will serve as the guide for the body and the head.

steps.headline: Sketch the position of the legs, and body.
steps.description: Add also the position of the ears.

steps.headline: Add the shapes for the feet and the hands.
steps.description: Use semi-circle and oblong for the feet. Use oblong for the hands.

steps.headline: Sketch the position of the fingers as well as the gloves and socks.
Add small circles at the end of the lines to indicate the tip of the fingers.
Sketch five curve in the side of the head.
steps.description: It must be decreasing in size from the head to the back. Add also the line for the tail.

steps.headline: Close the lines for Sonic’s quills.
Add the shapes for the eyes and the nose.
Add the details of the face.
Draw the basic features of Sonic.
Erase the draft and then, add more details.
Color Sonic.
Sketch a big circle, a smaller circle and a small oblong attached to each other.
steps.description: These will serve as the guide for the body and the head of Amy Rose.

steps.headline: Sketch the position of the extremities.
steps.description: Use lines and circles in doing so.

steps.headline: Add the shapes for the hands.
steps.description: Use lines if the hand is in an open position while use rectangle for closed fist.

steps.headline: Sketch the face.
Add the details of the face such as the eyes, mouth and nose.
Sketch her hair.
Add the ears.
Sketch Amy’s clothes.
steps.description: You could experiment on it. You could make her wear different clothes if you like.

steps.headline: Add the details of the shoes.
Draw the basic features of Amy Rose.
Erase the draft and then, add more details.
Color Amy Rose.
Sketch a big circle, and 2 smaller circles attached to each other.
Add the mouth area and the ears.
steps.description: Tails’ ears are big, and the mouth area occupies about a third of his head.

steps.headline: Sketch the position of the extremities.
steps.description: Use lines and circles in doing so.

steps.headline: Add the shapes for the hands.
steps.description: Use the circle to indicate the tip of the fingers.

steps.headline: Add the shapes for the socks and the gloves.
steps.description: It is shown in the picture in color pink.

steps.headline: Sketch the 2 tails using irregular curvy lines.
Add the main shape of the tails.
Add the fluff beside the mouth area and draw the hair features.
Add the eyes.
Add another fluff at each side of the chest area.
Draw the basic features of Tails.
Erase the draft and then, add more details.
Color Tails.
Sketch a big circle, a little bit smaller circle, and a slanted rectangle attached to each other.
Sketch the position of the extremities.
steps.description: Use lines rectangles (or squares) and circles. Also add the line for the tail.

steps.headline: Add the shapes for the hands.
Add the shapes for the shoes.
steps.description: Draw a circle just above the shoes area of each foot.

steps.headline: Sketch the hair and the face.
steps.description: A curved triangle is used for the eyes and a series of lines for the hair and the other face features.

steps.headline: Add the face.
steps.description: Draw the mouth, nose, and eyes.

steps.headline: Draw the basic features of Knuckles.
steps.description: You could use a picture of Knuckles as basis.

steps.headline: Erase the draft and then, add more details.
Color Knuckles.

text: Sonic Sketch a big circle and a smaller circle attached to each other. These will serve as the guide for the body and the head. Sketch the position of the legs, and body. Add also the position of the ears. Add the shapes for the feet and the hands. Use semi-circle and oblong for the feet. Use oblong for the hands. Sketch the position of the fingers as well as the gloves and socks.  Add small circles at the end of the lines to indicate the tip of the fingers.  Sketch five curve in the side of the head. It must be decreasing in size from the head to the back. Add also the line for the tail. Close the lines for Sonic’s quills.  Add the shapes for the eyes and the nose.  Add the details of the face.  Draw the basic features of Sonic.  Erase the draft and then, add more details.  Color Sonic.  Amy Rose Sketch a big circle, a smaller circle and a small oblong attached to each other. These will serve as the guide for the body and the head of Amy Rose. Sketch the position of the extremities. Use lines and circles in doing so. Add the shapes for the hands. Use lines if the hand is in an open position while use rectangle for closed fist. Sketch the face.  Add the details of the face such as the eyes, mouth and nose.  Sketch her hair.  Add the ears.  Sketch Amy’s clothes. You could experiment on it. You could make her wear different clothes if you like. Add the details of the shoes.  Draw the basic features of Amy Rose.  Erase the draft and then, add more details.  Color Amy Rose.  Tails Sketch a big circle, and 2 smaller circles attached to each other.  Add the mouth area and the ears. Tails’ ears are big, and the mouth area occupies about a third of his head. Sketch the position of the extremities. Use lines and circles in doing so. Add the shapes for the hands. Use the circle to indicate the tip of the fingers. Add the shapes for the socks and the gloves. It is shown in the picture in color pink. Sketch the 2 tails using irregular curvy lines.  Add the main shape of the tails.  Add the fluff beside the mouth area and draw the hair features.  Add the eyes.  Add another fluff at each side of the chest area.  Draw the basic features of Tails.  Erase the draft and then, add more details.  Color Tails.  Knuckles Sketch a big circle, a little bit smaller circle, and a slanted rectangle attached to each other.  Sketch the position of the extremities. Use lines rectangles (or squares) and circles. Also add the line for the tail. Add the shapes for the hands.  Add the shapes for the shoes. Draw a circle just above the shoes area of each foot. Sketch the hair and the face. A curved triangle is used for the eyes and a series of lines for the hair and the other face features. Add the face. Draw the mouth, nose, and eyes. Draw the basic features of Knuckles. You could use a picture of Knuckles as basis. Erase the draft and then, add more details.  Color Knuckles.
